test.instr: (:ins (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X closet) (type X container))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X white) (sort Y washmachine))) (:task (putdown X) (:cond (color X black) (sort X book))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X white) (type Y container) (sort Y closet))) (:task (putdown X) (:cond (color X white) (sort X book))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X black))) (:info (plate X) (:cond (sort X book))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (type X container))) (:cons_not (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (sort Y airconditioner)))) )
test.nl: Close the closet. Take out the white book from the washmachine. Put down the black book. Put the white bottle on the closet. Put down the white book. Pick the black bottle up. There is a book on the plate. The Doors of the containers are closed. Do not put the book on the airconditioner.
